events.text: you and i are pretty close, huh?
i know you’ve lived a whole other life since me, but i feel connected to you.
nine lives, though…i hope we mattered.
everyone hopes that. it feels kind of like only your life mattered, though. only [PlayerName]’s life. without you, we can’t move forward.
but you needed us to be here.
are you ready to face it, [PlayerName]? we’ve not had to until now.
